comments:
Description:
SWTError is thrown out after following steps

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report
2. Switch to Script tab in Editor view
3. Close Palette view
4. Reopen Palette view

Expected result:
Can reopen Palette view

Actual result:
SWTError is thrown out, and Palette view can't show up

Error log:
org.eclipse.swt.SWTError: Cannot initialize Drop
